entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 14 in low lying inland areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 14 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
